# SPI counters
<metric name="SPI_RA_VS_LOCK" block=SPI event=134 descr="Arb cycles VS has a CU locked when !fits and active_cnt < threshold. Source is RA0" > <metric name="SPI_RA_HS_LOCK" block=SPI event=136 descr="Arb cycles HS has a CU locked when !fits and active_cnt < threshold. Source is RA0" > <metric name="SPI_RA_CSG_LOCK" block=SPI event=137 descr="Arb cycles CSG has a CU locked when !fits and active_cnt < threshold. Source is RA0" > <metric name="SPI_RA_CSN_LOCK" block=SPI event=138 descr="Arb cycles CSN has a CU locked when !fits and active_cnt < threshold. Source is RA0" >
